**Tender Description**
---------------------

The Department of the Environment, Environment and Climate Change Canada (ECCC), is seeking proposals for the supply, delivery, and installation of direct readout ground stations to receive and process environmental data from the National Oceanic and Atmospheric Administration (NOAA) Geostationary Operational Environmental Satellite (GOES). 

The successful supplier will be required to provide training services, hardware warranty, hardware and firmware maintenance, and technical support services for a period of ten years following delivery and installation of the ground stations. 

Proposals must be submitted
